title: Pridegroupofficial
author: Pridegroupofficial
content: Hi everyones i am new user of this platform i want to post about my busines runing in UAE and other countries from last 20 years. i just heard about bitcointalk and want to creat a proper post to provide my company details. like what about my company is and how its work. THank You.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Not sure if your "business" is crypto-related, but the Service Announcements section is probably the right place: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=84.0

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Assuming that the company you're talking is about crypto/bitcoin or somewhat related, you can make a thread on Services Announcement board[1]. You can post(make a reply) your updates on that thread(you're making) instead of making a new thread. You can check some services thread (most of them have "[ANN]" word on the title) there for reference.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=84.0Edit: The same board suggested above while i'm typing.

comments.author: Pridegroupofficial
comments.body: Yes my business is related cryptocurencies. and 2nd question is Can i add my telegrame or whatsapp or any other link that people can get in touch with me if they are intrested?

You have been given link to service announcement, check some of the links there about service announcement and see how it is done, focussing on explaining about the service you want to render.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Pridegroupofficial on August 15, 2022, 08:03:06 AMyes i have a website but for that i want to creat another post on the right place at bitcointalk, here at this post i want to collect information about posting there my contacts or link things u know.i will make a proper post where all about my busines will be visible and fair. You can add the social media like Reddit, Discord, Twitter etc , not wrong at all, it is about your business, but make it professional. I was only surprised you did not mention your website while mentioning social media. Know that it is about your business, add all information necessary, most importantly, your website. Check those ANN threads on service announcement board to see how it is done and be very active on the thread that you create, read what people are posting.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Pridegroupofficial on August 15, 2022, 08:03:06 AMyes i have a website but for that i want to creat another post on the right place at bitcointalk, here at this post i want to collect information about posting there my contacts or link things u know.i will make a proper post where all about my busines will be visible and fair. * take a look in the service announcements how did others make announcements (look especially for those starting with [ANN])* make your ANN with as much info about the company as possible, presented nicely and easy to read (not a 2-liner, not a wall of text)* stay available for questions, expect people questioning your business, especially at start; keep in mind that some will be nice, some may be harsher if they find mistakes or fishy or unclear thingsKeep in mind that you, as newbie, won't be able to put images. If that's important for you, also consider acquiring copper membership.
